This template can be used for various calculations such as arithmetic, algebraic equations, geometry, and trigonometry. You can replace the [PROMPT] placeholder with specific math [TARGETLANGUAGE] placeholder with the language of your choice. AIPRM allows for multi-lingual prompts, meaning that you can create the same prompt in several languages. Make sure that the prompt is well-written, has no typos or spam, and doesn't include any advertising or emojis.
PromptHint: - Complex numbers - Matrices and determinants - Calculus (differentiation and integration) - Graphing and plotting equations - Statistical analysis - Probability distributions - Financial functions (e.g. compound interest)
